speech: Howdy! I am here to help you with making the tough decisions about colleges. I can provide comparisons of top three public universities of Texas.  The comparisons can be based on the admissions rate, graduation rate, student-to-faculty ratio, sex ratio, and cost of attendance. Which characteristic would you like me to compare?
